              John Kubale
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            I’m an infectious disease epidemiologist and Postdoctoral Research Fellow working in Dr. Aubree Gordon’s lab at the University of Michigan. My research focuses on respiratory viruses particularly respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and influenza. Specifically, I am interested in exploring the social, biological, and environmental drivers of severe respiratory illness associated with these pathogens.
            
            
            Education
            PhD in Epidemiology, 2020 University of Michigan
            MPH in Epidemiology, 2017 University of Michigan
            B.A. Liberal Arts, 2011 Xavier University
            Tweets by JKubale
